thread.title: Oracle's Larry Ellison unveils new services, products in cloud push - PC World
thread.title_full: Oracle's Larry Ellison unveils new services, products in cloud push - PC World - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: PC World
title: Oracle's Larry Ellison unveils new services, products in cloud push - PC World
text:
Oracle Executive Chairman Larry Ellison unveiled Sunday new cloud applications and services, including a training tool that integrates with the company's human resources application, and gave a glimpse of the company's security strategy. As is expected with Ellison's speeches, the keynote at Oracle OpenWorld in San Francisco was peppered with digs at rivals.
 PC World.
